topIssues.solution: Always use absolute paths or cd first
Remove emojis from code - use ASCII comments only
Remove Korean characters or escape them properly for non-UTF8 systems
Use semicolon (;) instead of && in PowerShell

recommendations: Focus on preventing these top issues:
- working_directory: Always use absolute paths or cd first
- emoji_in_code: Remove emojis from code - use ASCII comments only
- korean_encoding: Remove Korean characters or escape them properly for non-UTF8 systems
